projects.title: Weather App
projects.category: This is a simple weather app in which you can enter city name and weather info for that city will be shown. You can see temperatures both in Fahrenheits or Celsius. I used fetch API to fetch the data from weather-api.

projects.title: For A Good Cause
projects.category: In this app I made a mobile first design app where you can create a charity, donate $1 to one, see all available charities and see users and their charity logs.

projects.title: Restaurant
projects.category: In this project I built a simple Restaurant website. Using DOM manipulations and JavaScript alone to render whole content.

projects.title: To-do app
projects.category: In this project I built a to do app using plain JavaScript.You can make a new project and inside each project make a task, you can set the task priority and due dates. You can also delete each task or project.I used LocalStorage for storing the data and uuid for generating random id's.
